#summary count([where,include])
#labels api,0.8,model,class

_*Note:* This wiki contains "bleeding edge" documentation, which may reflect a future version of Wheels. Entries in the wiki may also be incomplete and unedited. For the "official" documentation, please visit [http://www.cfwheels.com/docs Official ColdFusion on Wheels Documentation]._

*Description*:

Returns the number of rows that match the arguments (or all rows if no arguments are passed in). Uses the SQL function COUNT.

*Return Type*:

Numeric

*

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *where* || string || false ||  || A SQL fragment such as admin=1 for example. ||
|| *include* || string || false ||  || Any associations that needs to be included in the query. ||



*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset authorCount = model("Author").count()>
}}}

{{{
<cfset authorOnACount = model("Author").count(where="lastName LIKE 'A%'")>
}}}

{{{
<cfset authorWithBooksOnACount = model("Author").count(include="books", where="title LIKE 'A%'")>


}}}
